entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • random.next(low, hi) his is sometimes exclusive and sometimes inclusive. #59788
  • API Named SetupDiEnumDeviceInterfaces Of setupapi.dll Error At .net core platform #59787
  • JIT: a number of OSR stress tests failing with an assert #59785
    7.0.0
  • Android x64: `Loader.classloader` runtime tests failing with `Error trying to get device: cmd: Can't find service: package` #59779
  • [Android] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates ExportCertificatePems_MultiCert Failure #59777
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend Memory Mapped Files support #59776
  • [API Proposal]: File.WriteAllBytes overload for Span<byte> and ReadOnlySpan<byte> #59770
  • Mono does not load native shared libraries next to an assembly with a DllImport to it. #59766
  • Segfault in tracing/eventpipe/reverseouter/reverseouter/reverseouter.sh on Ubuntu. #59758
  • Bug System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher #59756
  • .NET 6 regression on writing to character device #59754
    6.0.0
  • It’s not possible to send a SIGTERM signal, which requests the application to gracefully terminate #59746
  • Community Triagers Trial #59744
  • [wasm] Regression. mono-aot-cross asserts with function:mono_method_to_ir, VAR 1 (TValue_REF) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations #59739
  • CI failure in "Build Browser wasm Release AllSubsets_Mono" leg #59736

Closed

  • Missing tag/release for 5.0.10 #59250
  • bundled_self_contained_nocompression_app_run_succeeds blocking CI #53551
    6.0.0
  • Host tests often fail on text file busy issues #53587
    6.0.0
  • Please provide MSI installer for .Net5 #58859
  • Licence of Microsoft.Extensions in .NET Core 3.1.x ? #59740
  • MemoryMappedViewAccessor: Dispose flushes on temporary files #59606
  • Breaking changes on ConfigurationBinder behaviour #58330
    6.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21454.3] Cannot create instance of type 'Sentry.Dsn' when launch just-an-email #58852
    6.0.0
  • JsonSourceGenerator - ArgumentException key already added. #58985
    6.0.0
  • IHost.RunAsync() never completes via pm2 start and stop. #59644
    7.0.0
  • How to implement Stream nowadays? #59403
  • Alpine docker image does not obey local timezone anymore #59636
    6.0.0
  • Linux/Arm: BBJ_ALWAYS block remains unvisited during dominance computation #59298
    7.0.0
  • .NET6 preview 7 cannot find System.Net.Quic automatically. #59730
    7.0.0
  • Test failed file_io.GetFileSize.test1 #58481
    7.0.0
  • Dotnet command cannot be found after installing .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21476.4-osx-x64.pkg on Apple M1. #59691
  • Exception in TLS handshake on one windows machine but not the other #59735
  • Unable to generate a core dump of .NET 5 application in OSX #55211
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Building sourcebuild leg with portable flag #59786
  • JIT: better support for patchpoints in try regions #59784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle version #59783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataStaticVersion to prevent source-build from building w/6.0 version. #59782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix issue with incorrect handling of optimized method layouts #59781
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Regex source generator to use new GetBestTypeByMetadataName method #59778
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm][debugger] Fix reuse buffer #59775
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59774
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix reusing buffer for debugger #59773
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Stop running runtime tests on Android arm64, until the installation timeout gets fixed #59772
  • [release/6.0] Treat 'abstract' properties the same as 'virtual' for src-gen #59771
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #59767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update WCF dependencies on the compat pack #59764
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add new analyzers to CodeAnalysis.globalconfig files #59763
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove ILStrip temporarily to retain ActiveIssue attributes in release mobile device configuration #59762
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Partially disable test #59760
    area-System.IO
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic (#59450) #59757
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix NRT warnings in source generated code #59755
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Update DllImportGenerator style to match repo conventions #59753
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Add beginnings of support for WASI. #59752
    arch-wasm
  • [Mono]: Fix hfa type field count to handle more cases under LLVM. #59751
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during delegate invoke #59749
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update HostFactoryResolver to account for lack of application name with new host pattern #59743
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • fix resolveVirtualMethodHelper #59742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Obsolete Regex.CompileToAssembly #59734
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep #59106
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not enregister Return SP check variable #59759
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Retry installer Process.Start if ETXTBSY #59765
    area-Host
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Revert bind single elements to array in configuration binder #59733
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • fix few more QUIC tests that can hang #59682
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use cmakedefine in eglib config #59623
    community-contribution
  • Treat 'abstract' properties the same as 'virtual' for src-gen #59707
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger after ts changes #59702
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add initial codespaces support for dotnet/runtime #59723
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Increase the number of preallocated trampolines for Mono FullAOT runtime test runs #59737
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, runtime-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Time Zone when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #59727
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • Add PEM exports to certificates #59674
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Acknowledge community triagers in area-owners.md #59748
    area-Meta
  • Arm: Include BBJ_ALWAYS blocks in dominance calculation #59376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • delay locking in `ConcurrentDictionary.GrowTable` until necessary #59656
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Prefer readonlyspan properties over readonly array fields #59670
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #59698
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Reusing buffer to avoid allocate every debugger message #59480
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use new cross-build images for arm/arm64 builds #59534
    community-contribution
  • Append _FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 to CMAKE_REQUIRED_DEFINITIONS #59504
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Integrate changes from NativeAOT branch #59510
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some AOTCONST instructions if they are not used. #59699
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Deduplicate epilogs in Type.operator== #59711
    area-System.Runtime
  • Antigen: Change Antigen's helixqueue to public #59657
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Only run source-index on main branch. #59725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Fix for GitHub issue #59432 and the corresponding regression test #59663
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Build one MonoTargetsTasks assembly for Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk pack #59720
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix assert for chain of ASG nodes after tail-calls #59708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Nonzero Exit Code for performance-setup Failures #59483
    tenet-performance
  • Fixes #38162 #56860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Refactor `fgMorphCast` #59713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Host
  • fixes to get Quic working on macOS #59728
    os-mac-os-x, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • [draft][wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose cross-platform helpers for Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 #53450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 #59572
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add openSUSE 15.2 #59574
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 #59578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
